topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538d19666368726ed0df0500#post_538d19666368726ed0df0500
Its 100% pure fetishism, and it does not necessarily connote a sympathy for Nazism*.

You see its all in the way Nazis have become conflated with pure evil in the western mind, and in that domination, cruelty and depravity. They certainly earned that reputation after all.

With the distance of time though, and the simple fact that evil is sexy people, especially people into BDSM have conflated that wist sexual cruelty, domination and depravity. That OC springs from the same impulse as my all time favorite exploitation film, Ilsa: She Wolf of the SS.

*Note: I'm sure there are some who are in fact sympathetic towards Nazism, but that is a whole different subject of fucked up.
